In the future, Lanie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like biscuits, canned goods, candies, and groceries

loans.name: Esperanza  De Vida Con El Futuro Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo  “Eperanza de vida con el futuro”  la cual está conformada por 09 integrantes responsables. Este es el caso de ketty  de 34 años de edad es separada con un hijo dependiente. Ella se dedica a la venta de helados. Hace 04 meses que viene desempeñandose a dicho negocio el cual le va bien. Su mayor deseo es expandir su negocio de venta de helados. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de helados. Los integrantes del grupo “Esperanza de vida con el futuro” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por el apoyo brindado. Ketty se encuentra de pie en la parte posterior es la cuarta del lado derecho y viste polo verde.
texts.en: This is the "Esperanza de vida con el futuro" group which is made up of 9 responsible members. This is the case for Ketty, 34 years old, who is separated with a dependent child. She works selling ice creams. She has been working in this business for 4 months, which is going well for her. Her greatest desire is to expand her business selling ice creams. She asked for this loan to purchase ice cream. The members of the “Esperanza de vida con el futuro” group are grateful to the Kiva investors for the support offered. Ketty is standing in the back, is the fourth from the right and is wearing a green shirt.

loans.use: to purchase ice cream.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, brick, iron, gravel, etc. to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Adalberto

texts.es:
Adalberto, de 43 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casado y su esposa tiene una venta de tortillas y pupusas, tiene dos hijos estudiando en la escuela del cantón.

Adalberto, se ha dedicado a la carpintería por muchos años.

Ahora Adalberto, necesita el préstamo para comprar (madera), ya que tiene que hacer dos portones que le han encargado y este trabajo le generará buenos ingresos.

Adalberto, desea que sus hijos tengan una buena educación y también, desea hacer más grande su taller de carpintería.
texts.en:
Adalberto, 43 years old, went to school up to the ninth grade. He is married and his wife sells tortillas and pupusas; he has two children who are going to the canton's school.

Adalberto has worked in carpentry for many years.

Now Adalberto needs a loan to purchase wood, since he has to make two gates that have been ordered and this work will generate good income for him.

Adalberto wants his children to have a good education and also wants to enlarge his carpentry workshop.

loans.use: to purchase wood.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.es:
Florencio es un hombre de 55 años de edad, soltero, tiene 1 hijo de 18 años y una hija de 15 años, y su negocio es la venta de artículos varios.
Él es buen padre, independiente, constante, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ’12 de octubre’ considerada una de las pioneras de la ciudad, cuenta con más de 9.000 habitantes y se caracteriza por acoger en casi la totalidad de sus calles y avenidas a cerca de medio millón de gremiales. A lo largo de la avenida está asentada casi una decena de asociaciones de comerciantes minoristas en artículos varios. De clima frio y seco, con una temperatura variable durante el día entre 0-12 grados centígrados.
Florencio es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro corto, ojos obscuros, complexión física delgada, usa lentes de aumento, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia, para el comercio habla español. Su vida la comparte con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela y tienen planes de continuar con estudios superiores, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de artículos varios, como; cortaúñas, papel higiénico, cepillo de dientes, peine para cabello, etc. La necesidad de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia lo llevó a solicitar un préstamo para la refacción de su vivienda. Las lluvias y vientos de la época ocasionaron el desprendimiento de parte del techo, ocasionando la filtración de agua y la rajadura de la pared. Toda la familia comparte la misma habitación, el deterioro de su vivienda hiso que parte de su mercadería se estropeara y cada vez que llueve el agua sigue ocasionando mayores destrozos. “las filtraciones del techo de mi casa, rajaron la pared, arruinaron mi mercadería y no dejan a mis hijos dormir, cada noche vivimos una pesadilla…” comenta. Su sueño es darle una vida confortable a su familia, él desea realizar la refacción del techo de su casa y arreglar las paredes agrietadas. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 17 años que trabaja en el comercio.
Es por estos motivos que Florencio solicita un préstamo para la reparación del techo de su casa, para que no entre agua y sus hijos puedan dormir tranquilos.
texts.en:
Florencio is a 55 years old. He is single and has an 18 year old son and a 15 year old daughter. His business is selling various items. He is a good father, independent, reliable, responsible and hardworking. He operates his business in the ’12 de Octubre’ area, considered one of the city pioneers. It has more than 9,000 residents and is characterized by having close to half a million of union members in its streets and avenues. Along its avenue there are almost ten retail merchant associations for various items. It has a cold and dry climate, with a temperature that varies during the day between 1-12 centigrade.  

Florencio has dark skin, short stature, short black hair, dark eyes, a thin build, and he uses glasses. His mother tongue is Aymará, which he speaks with his family. For business, he speaks Spanish. He shares his life with his children, who go to school and are planning on going to college. He lives in his own house built of brick with a metal sheeting roof. It has potable water, electricity, gas and plumbing. His business is selling various items, such as nail clippers, toilet paper, toothbrushes, combs, etc. The need to improve his family's quality of life led to him asking for a loan to repair his home. The rain and wind of the season have damaged a part of his roof, causing leaks and damage to the walls. His whole family shares the same room, and the deterioration in his home made part of his merchandise to be destroyed and every time it rains the water continues to to destroy more. “The leaks in the roof of my house damaged the wall, ruined my merchandise, and won't let my children sleep. Every night we live a nightmare…” he says. His dream is to give his family a comfortable life. He wants to repair the roof on his house and fix the cracked walls. This is his first loan cycle  with the institution in the 17 years he has worked as a merchant.

That is why Florencio is asking for a loan to repair the roof of his house so water won't leak in and his children can sleep in peace.

loans.use: to repair the roof of his house so water won't leak in and his children can sleep in peace.

loans.name: María Alicia

texts.es:
María, de 56 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, es madre soltera de dos hijos, ya están acompañados y en casa solo viven con ella dos nietos que están estudiando.

María, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 48 años, trabajo que aprendió de sus padres y que le ha ayudado para el sustento de su hogar; la distancia que viaja para llegar a su trabajo es de 2 kilómetros, se transporta en moto-taxi y su horario de trabajo es de 5:00 a 11:00 de la mañana, luego se dedica a los oficios de la casa.
 
María, está solicitando el crédito para comprar 2 sacos de abono, 2 litros de foliar, un litro de veneno y comprar 1000 plantas de chile, ella piensa que con este cultivo, podrá tener mejores ganancias y traer beneficio a su familia.

María, sueña con tener un carro para llevar sus producto y poder ampliar su siembra de hortaliza, para poder dar empleo a otras personas y que sus nietos puedan ser profesionales a futuro.
texts.en:
María is 56 years old. She went to school up to the second grade. She is a single mother of two children. They are already married and only two grandchildren live with her. They are in school. 

María has worked in agriculture for 48 years. She learned this work from her parents and it has helped her support her home. She travels 2 kilometers to get to her work. She gets there in motorcycle taxi and her work schedule is from 5:00 to 11:00 in the morning. Later she does the housework. 
 
María is asking for the loan to buy 2 bags of fertilizer, 2 liters of foliar spray, a liter of poison and 1000 chile plants. She thinks that with this crop she can have better profits and bring benefits to her family. 

María dreams of having a car to transport her products and be able to expand her vegetable crop, so that she can give other people jobs and so that her children can graduate from college in the future.

loans.use: to buy 2 backs of fertilizer, a liter of poison, as well as 1000 chile plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, sugar, and lard to make bread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, iron, gravel, etc. to build a fourth bedroom.

loans.name: Vilma Del Carmen

texts.es: Vilma de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica desde hace 10 años a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza y con la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: 34-year-old Vilma lives in her own home with her husband and son. She has worked for 10 years making and selling tortillas from her home. She has a large clientele and her sales, along with help from her husband, enable her to get by. She is applying for a loan to buy corn in quitales (100 lbs) and lime so that she can continue making tortillas and boost her income. This would then allow her to achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to by corn in quintales (100 lbs) and lime

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour, concentrate and vaccines for his animals.

loans.name: Rosa Elizabeth

texts.es: Rosa de 46 años de edad se dedica desde hace 22 años a la venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Rosa es madre vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor y cal para poder continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Rosa, 46 years old, has worked for the past 22 years selling tortillas. Her business is located in her place of residence and she has many clients. With the sales she makes, she is able to cover the expenses that come up at home. Rosa is a mother and lives in her own home with her three children. She is requesting a loan to purchase wholesale corn and lime so that she can continue with her sales and as a result, have a better income in order to have better financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale corn and lime

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour, oil and yeast to make bread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a café and buy soft drinks, sweets, corn, meat and vegetables for making meals.

loans.name: Lucely

texts.es:
Lucely es una ganadora, una mujer que ha salido de grandes adversidades, superado fuertes obstáculos, se apoya en Dios y en su familia, a sus 38 años de edad, es responsable de dos adolescentes de 10 y 17 años de edad, quedo viuda y con su negocio de venta de ropa mantiene su hogar, esforzándose mucho para poder llevar alimento a su hogar.
Inicio con su negocio por una gran necesidad económica, que poco a poco fue cubriendo con sus buenas resultado, y hoy que tiene un camino ya recorrido quiere mejorar su empresa, ofertar empleo, tener sostenibilidad en el tiempo, darle estudio a sus hijos, mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda etc.
Lucely quiere solicitar tu apoyo, para cambiar la mercancía de su negocio y actualizarla a las nuevas tendencias, que le vienen preguntando mucho sus clientes.
texts.en: Lucely is a winner, a woman who has faced huge adversity and overcome many obstacles. She puts her trust in God and her family. At the age of 38, she is responsible for two teenage children of 10 and 17 years of age, having been widowed. Her business selling clothing enables her to cover her household expenses and she works tremendously hard to provide food for the family. She set up her business because she was in dire need. She gradually managed to cover her costs thanks to her good results and now, with this experience behind her, she wants to expand her business, take on staff, ensure that the business is sustainable, provide an education for her children, make improvements to her home etc. Lucely would like to ask you to help her so that she can change the goods for sale in her shop and stock the latest fashions which her customers want.

loans.use: to refresh the stock in her shop by buying clothing.

loans.name: Zulia Yudis

texts.es:
Zulia es una mujer morena de 42 años de edad, muy trabajadora, ambiciosa, perseguidora de sus sueños, con carácter para llevar de buena manera su negocio de tienda general, donde tiene un principio y es ser muy correcta con sus clientes desde tener un buen trato, tener precios justos y una confianza de comprar en una tienda que busca calidad tanto humana y comercial para sus clientes.
Es madre de un hijo ya mayor de edad, vive con su pareja y esta tienda es la fuente de ingresos que los has levantado de la pobreza desde el año 2011.
El sueño más loco de Zulia es poder comprar una vivienda propia y esta trabajando diariamente largas jornadas laborales para ir juntando capital para lograr este sueño, bien sea que compren la casa de contado o por cuotas.
El principio básico de una tienda de abarrotes es tener surtido variado para captar y atraer el mayor número de clientes posibles, y pensando en dicho principio Zulia quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar como lo son huevo, café, panes, panela, arroz, sal, azúcar, quesito, entre otros productos para fortaleces el inventario de su negocio.
texts.en:
Zulia is dark skinned 42 year old woman who is very hard- working ambitious and persevering in her dreams. She has the character to run her business which is a small store where she has a principal and that is to be very proper with her customers. Besides treating them well, have fair prices and have the confidence of buying in a store that looks for quality both human and commercial for her clients.

She is the mother of a son who is now an adult and lives with her partner. The store is what has raised them out of poverty since 2011. Zulia's wildest dream is to be able to buy her own house and is working long hours every day to amass capital to achieve this dream, be it buying it in cash or on installment.

The main principal of her grocery store is to have a variety of stock to capture and attract the greatest possible number of clients and thinking of this principal Zulia wants to request a loan to buy an assortment of basic food items like eggs, coffee, bread, sweet bread, rice, salt, sugar, cheese amongst others to strengthen the inventory of her store.

loans.use: to buy eggs, bread, rice, salt, sugar, cheese amongst other products to strengthen the inventory of her enterprise.

loans.name: Evelyn Julieth

texts.es:
Evelyn es una joven de 25 años de edad, madre de una pequeña criatura de 3 años, felizmente casada, es muy trabajadora, responsable y amigable, ejerciendo sus actividades de salón de belleza donde paralelamente de destaca como una pulida barbera.
Inicio su negocio por gusto al trabajo independiente y detectando una oportunidad de trabajo en su sector residencial, donde había muchos salones de belleza pero no barberías y desde entonces ha tenido buena acogida por parte de los clientes.
Sus necesidades principales en su negocio pasan por lo estético, al iniciar con un capital muy bajo invirtió en lo esencial para iniciar a operar, pero su negocio como tal pide a gritos una mano para realizar varias reformas como lo son: pintura, resanada de las paredes, colocar cerámica al piso, y paredes.
Por dichas necesidades quiere solicitar un préstamo para realizar estas reformas locativas, siendo el principal beneficiado los clientes pues encontraran un espacio más amigable para ir a peinarse, motilarse o por los servicios de barbería.
texts.en: 25-year-old Evelyn is happily married and the mother of a small child of 3. She is very hardworking, responsible and friendly in the way she runs her beauty salon where she is also an outstanding hairdresser and barber. She set up her business because she likes being self-employed and because she saw an opportunity to work in a residential area where there were lots of beauty salons but no barbershops. Since then, her services have been appreciated by her customers. Her main business needs are aesthetic ones. Having set up the business with only a small amount of capital, she invested in just the essentials required to start trading, but her business premises are now crying out for repairs: painting, patching up of walls, have clay put on the floor and walls. Consequently, she would like to apply for a loan to have these repairs to her premises done . Her customers will be the main beneficiaries as they will have more pleasant surroundings in which to have their hair styled or cut or have a shave.

loans.use: to have repairs done: painting, patching up of walls, have clay put on the floor and walls

loans.name: Yonatan Farley

texts.es:
Él es Yonatan un joven de 24 años de edad, con gran responsabilidad la cual es mantener a sus dos hijos de 3 y 2 años de edad, junto con su pareja la cual cuida los niños. 
Yonatan se desempeña como comerciante, vendiendo bolsos, riñoneras y gorras en un almacén que con mucho esfuerzo y ahorros logro montar.
Con su negocio Yonatan quiere generar empleo, ofrecer productos nuevos, tener sostenibilidad en el tiempo, tener precios competitivos, aumentar su inventario, mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus clientes, incrementar su utilidad, y hoy se encuentra muy motivado pues puede cumplir varios de sus propósitos con tu ayuda, pues lo hará de la siguiente manera. Formalmente se encuentra solicitando un apoyo financiero para la compra de surtido, pudiendo cumplir con incrementar su utilidad, con lo que atraerá más clientes, mejorar sus ventas, tendrá mas ganancias y podrá seguir manteniendo su negocio que es lo único que le da ingresos para mantener su familia.
texts.en: Yonatan is a young 24 year old man, with the great responsibility of supporting his two sons who are 3 and 2 years old, together with his domestic partner who takes care of them. Yonatan works in commerce selling purses, belt pouches and caps at a store which he opened thanks to a lot of effort and savings. With his business, Yonatan wants to generate employment, offer new products, keep the business sustainable in time, have competitive prices, increase stock, improve his sales, increase his customers and increase his profitability. Presently, he is very motivated because he will be able to fulfill his dreams thanks to your help and in the following way: he is formally requesting a loan to buy a diverse stock of products in order to increase his profitability. With this he will attract more customers, improve his sales, have more earnings, and keep his business running, which is the only means of income to support his family.

loans.use: to buy a stock of caps, purses, belt pouches and wallets.

loans.name: Deborah

texts.en:
Deborah is married and has six children, and four of her children go to school. She also takes care of additional family members (grandchildren). She resides in the family house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and food for the family. 

She has a business of selling fish and has been in this business for six years. She is aspiring to build more rental rooms. 

She has applied for a loan of 3,000,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more fish. She works at the market seven days a week and sells to all categories of people, but on a wholesale basis only. Her major business challenges include transportation and rainy season, which hinder her customers' ability to reach her.

loans.use: to buy more fish.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
Elsa tiene 52 años de edad, vive en casa familiar de material rústico en la parte rural del distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en esta comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y venta de animales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, asi como a brindar servicio de copias y tipeos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio, cuenta con 13 años de experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de sus clientes. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Elsa espera ofrecer mayor variedad de ropa a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elsa is 52 years old and lives in the family house made of rustic materials in a rural part of the province of Jaén, Cajamarca region in the North Andes of Peru. Life in this community is quiet, the inhabitants work in agriculture and the sales of animals.


Elsa works selling clothing for women, men and children as well as offering typing and copying. Her business is located in her house and she has 13 years experience in the business with good references from her clients. The loan will be used to buy a greater quantity of clothing for women, men and children to increase the stock in her business. Doing this Elsa wants to offer a greater variety of clothing to her clients which will generate more income and in the end allow her to improve her quality of living and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of clothing for women, men and children to increase the stock of her business.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is thankful that she was granted a 15,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase various products to sell. Through her earnings she is able to send her children to school and meet their daily living expense. 

She would now like to apply for a 15,000 PHP loan that she will use as to buy food supplements and vitamins and to add some more footwear and clothing to sell. Filipinos are now more knowledgeable and health-conscious to take food supplements and vitamins for their well-being. Her income from her store is a stable source to sustain her family's basic needs and for the education of her children. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her. 

Margie dreams of having a worldwide distributorship for her products. She hopes to build their dream house and send her children to the best schools. Every week she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God that she studies.

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital  and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional products such as vitamins, food supplements and add more footwear and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Jeronimo De Jesus

texts.es:
Jerónimo es un agricultor de 58 de años, es padre de 3 hijos y propietario de un extenso cultivo de arroz, como campesino es muy trabajador y preocupado por su familia, trabaja todos los días, ocho horas por día.
El arroz es uno de los granos más consumidos por los colombianos siendo estos cultivos de vital importancia para el equilibrio en las comidas, y personas como Jerónimo son los que crean dicho equilibrio.
Jerónimo busca un apoyo para comprar insumos, abonos y jornales, la razón del monto es que tiene que cubrir varias hectáreas y haciendo la cuenta este es el capital que necesita y no lo tiene, siendo tu apoyo primordial para que este productor de arroz siga ejerciendo su profesión.
texts.en: 58-year-old Jerónimo is a farmer. He has 3 children and owns a large rice field. Born and bred in the country, he is very hardworking and concerned about his family. Her works for 8 hours every day. Rice, which is one of the most widely consumed grains in Colombia, is of vital importance in balanced meals and it is people like Jerónimo who provide this balance. He is seeking help to buy supplies, manure and to pay day labourers. He needs the amount stated because he has to cover a number of hectares. His calculations revealed how much he needs but, as he does not have it, your help is vital to enable this rice grower to stay in business.

loans.use: to buy manure and an irrigation system to cover all his rice field

loans.name: Betty Del Socorro

texts.es:
Betty es una mujer guerrera, luchadora, que trabaja diariamente por su familia, por tener un mejor futuro, una mejor calidad de vida, cuando le cerraron las puertas para tener un empleo ella no se detuvo y busco alternativas para ser y sentirse útil para su familia, y es este sentimiento que la llevo a iniciar su negocio como vendedora de productos de uso doméstico y con ello ha sabido levantar una numerosa familia conformada por 4 hijos, de verdad una mujer de admirar.
Betty solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercancía pues trabaja por encargo, con el dinero comprar surtido de lociones, productos capilares, cremas, faciales y algunos accesorios que le encargaron.
texts.en: Betty is a fighter, a woman who works daily for the benefit of her family and to give them a better future and a better quality of life. When she was denied a job opportunity she was not deterred and sought alternatives to be and feel useful. It is this feeling that prompted her to start her own business as a seller of household products. This has enabled her to raise a large family of four children; she is indeed an admirable woman. Betty is requesting a loan to buy merchandise--she works on commission--and acquire the array of lotions, hair products, lotions, facial products, and accessories ordered by her customers.

loans.use: to buy an array of personal products for resale in order to support her four children.

loans.name: Sochan

texts.en:
Sochan is a 31-year-old married factory worker with a young dependent child. She lives in the Kampong Chhnang province in Cambodia. Her husband is a 35-year-old rice farmer, and he also climbs the palm trees to get the sweet palm juice to make palm sugar to sell. The palm trees have long solid flowers, and the farmers use sharp knives to cut the tips of the flower and then the drops of natural sweet juice will come out. It is a kind of drink, and farmers can refine it until it becomes palm sugar. 

Together, they can make around USD 8.8 per day. 

Now Sochan would like to request a loan to buy an ox for her husband for plowing and transporting firewood for making palm sugar. With this loan, she will have enough finances to buy an ox for her husband. In the future, she hopes that her husband will be able to expand the sugar production and she also wants to help her child in earning high education.

loans.use: to buy an ox for her husband for plowing and transporting firewood for making palm sugar.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a porch on his house and prevent the walls from damage from the rain and sun, and give his family more space and comfort.

loans.name: Larrie

texts.en:
Larrie works hard to support her family. 

Larrie is married and has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 35 years now.

Larrie requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fish to sell.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Ephantus

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Ephantus, a 45-year-old jovial father of lovely children whom he refers to as his “heartbeat.”

Ephantus hails from the Kerugoya area of Kenya, a place that has produced some top elite athletes for the world.  Kerugoya has good weather patterns that favor crop and dairy farming. 

Ephantus is a very hardworking man who enjoys farming, which he has been doing on his small piece of land for the past 13 years. Through all those years, he has gained much experience and is one of the most respected farmers in his village. Because of the immense knowledge that he has of farming, Ephantus offers extension services to other farmers who are new in the business. Being a caring and loving father, Ephantus has been able to take care of his family and support them through the profits he has earned from farming. 

Although Ephantus reaps much profit from farming, one challenge that he is facing that is dragging him down and preventing him from reaching the top of the skies is lack of enough land to farm. For this reason, Ephantus is seeking a loan of KES 200,000 to buy a piece of land and expand his farming activities. Having so much experience in farming, Ephantus is sure that he will make good use of the land and double his profit levels. Through the profits, he would be able to repay the loan and improve his living conditions. 

Ephantus is sure that if you invest in him, he will be able to realize his dream of having a good quality life and securing his children's future. Ephantus has gone through the repayment schedule and amount and is comfortable with the plan. Support the project of an enterprising Kenyan man! He aspires to have a very productive start to the year.

loans.use: To buy a piece of land.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a 25-year-old married man who rides a motorcycle for transport business. He started the business to generate income and hopes to buy land for farming. 

He faces a challenge of poor roads that lead him to constant mechanical breakdowns, hence expenditures in repairs and reduction in his expected returns. 

He needs a credit facility to improve his house by plastering it.

loans.use: to improve his house by plastering it.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Ella es Daniela una joven de 20 años de edad que nunca le gusto pedir nada, es muy juiciosa y consciente de sus capacidades por ello trabaja para alcanzar su propias metas, una joven con una forma de ser de admirar, se dedica a la venta de mercancía como ropa y calzado y con ello apoya primeramente en su hogar cuando carecen de alimento, o hay alguna cuenta para pagar, segundo se paga su propio estudio, su transporte, libros entre otros.
Su meta es juntar el dinero para pagar su semestre y ser un apoyo incondicional en su hogar es por eso que requiere de tu ayuda pues anda solicitando un préstamo para comprar ropa y calzado que distribuirá en la universidad, a familiares y amigos, con tu apoyo permitirás que esta joven siga con su hermosa labor y no pare sus estudios.
texts.en: This is Daniela, a 20-year-old woman who has never liked to ask for anything. She is very prudent and aware of her own capabilities. Because of this, she works hard to reach her goals. She is a young woman of admirable character who makes a living by selling clothing and footwear. Her earnings help support her family when they lack food or have bills to pay; the remainder she uses to pay for her education, transportation expenses, and books, among other things. Daniela's goal is to save enough money to pay for her academic semester and support her family unconditionally. Thus, she needs help and is requesting a loan to buy clothing and footwear to sell at the university and to family and friends. Your support will enable her to continue her commendable work and her studies.

loans.use: to buy clothing and footwear for resale and help pay for household and educational expenses.

loans.name: Tomas Antonio

texts.es: Tomas de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hija, el se dedica a la carpintería desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando las puertas pintando la casa, pero con lo que gana no le alcanza para realizarlo por esa razón solicita un  crédito para  la compra de 2 puertas, pintura y pago de mano de obra, para poder mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Tomas, age 39, lives in his own house with his life partner and his daughter.  He has worked in carpentry for several years.  With what he gets from his work, he manages to pay for some of the household expenses.

He wants to improve his house by changing the doors and painting the house.  However, he does not earn enough to do so.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy two doors and paint and to pay for labor in order to be able to improve his house.

loans.use: to buy two doors and paint and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Mario Orlando

texts.es: Mario de 62 años de edad  vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas y su esposa, el se dedica desde hace 30 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y frijol, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, Mario está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Mario, age 62, lives in his own house with his two daughters and his wife.  He has been working in agriculture, growing corn and beans, for 30 years.  When he has his harvest, he sells it in the surrounding villages.  He has a lot of fixed customers.

Mario is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pesticides, and herbicides, etc.  He will improve the land that is shown in the photo in order to be able to continue with his crops.  This is his only source of work.  This way he will have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pesticides, and herbicides, and to improve the land.

loans.name: Amelia Leticia

texts.es:
Amelia tiene 61 años de edad, vive en casa familiar de material rústico con su madre y hermanos en el distrito de Pomahuaca que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se realizan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de arroz, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 25 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. El préstamo será utilizado en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera Amelia espera mejorar tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productivamente su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna y por ende tendrá mayor producción lo que le generará mayores ingresos y le permitirá incrementar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Amelia, age 61, lives in the family house, which is made of basic materials, with her mother and siblings.  She lives in the Pomahuaca district, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru.  The main business activities in this district are agriculture, livestock, and commerce.

She works in agriculture.  Specifically, she grows corn.  She has 25 years of experience in the field, and she has very good personal and work references from the inhabitants of her district.

The loan will be used for agricultural work, applications, use of plant health products, fertilizers, and labor for her harvest.  This way Amelia anticipates the physiological, morphological, and prolific improvement of his crop.  She also hopes to have a timely harvest, which will have greater production.  This will generate greater earnings, and it will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to pay for agricultural work, applications, use of plant health products, fertilizers, and labor for her harvest.

loans.name: Maria Agnes

texts.en:
Maria Agnes is 43 years old, married, and has two children who are both in school, Maria Agnes works very hard to provide for them.

Maria Agnes runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years now and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like rice, canned goods, groceries, etc.

In the future, Maria Agnes would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like rice, canned goods, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Lebectora

texts.en:
Lebectora is 67 years old, married, and has nine children. 

Lebectora is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Lebectora has been in pig fattening for two years now, and she has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Lebectora requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

In the future, Lebectora would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Yarie Maria

texts.es:
Una máquina de coser industrial se ha convertido en la obsesión y necesidad de Yarie una confeccionista de 35 años de edad, madre de 2 hijos de 8 y 14 años, brinda trabajo a una persona pero aspira a tener más empleadas a través de una estrategia que está trazando en torno a la máquina de coser industrial.
Aprendió a coser gracias a su madre, trabaja diariamente 12 horas y siempre ha soñado con tener un local fuera de casa.
Solicita un préstamo para ajustar para la compra de la máquina de coser industrial e iniciar con su plan de mejora  del negocio, donde podrá contar con más empleados al tener mayor capacidad de producción.
texts.en: An industrial sewing machine has become an obsession and a need for Yarie, a 35-year-old seamstress and mother of two children aged 8 and 14. She employs one person, but hopes to employ more people through a strategy she is developing around an industrial sewing machine. Yarie learned to sew from her mother, works 12 hours a day, and has always dreamt of having a business outside of her home. She is requesting a loan to purchase an industrial sewing machine and initiate her business improvement plan, which will enable her to have greater production capacity and thus more employees.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a 48-year-old married man with three children, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

He is a farmer dealing in dairy farming and growing maize. He hopes to extend his farm project on bigger scale in order to have more produce.

He is faced with hardships of limited capital that hinder his developing to the next level. He has asked for a loan to hire a tractor to till the land for maize farming.

loans.use: to hire a tractor to till the land for maize farming.

loans.name: Coralia Maribel

texts.es: Coralia de 45 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposo y su hijo en casa propia, Coralia está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Coralia is 45 years old and has made a living for many years growing corn and beans that she sells in different markets located near her house. Coralia lives with her husband and her son in a home that they own. Coralia is requesting this loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizers, composts, plague control, etc. and to improve her land that is shown in the photograph. This will let her continue to work and improve her profits.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, plague control, etc. and to improve her land.

loans.name: Ferrari Group

texts.es:
El grupo Ferrari está integrado por personas trabajadoras, responsables y muy alegres. Dalia es una mujer dedicada a su familia, tiene 37 años de edad y está casada con Marcelo. Juntos han formado una familia con cuatro hijos y actualmente todos se encuentran estudiando.

Desde hace 10 años Dalia y su esposo venden accesorios para teléfonos. Ellos iniciaron su vida como comerciantes en la capital del país (aproximadamente a 2 horas de su comunidad) aunque vendían artículos de fantasía y posteriormente notaron que el mercado de los celulares seguía creciendo y cambiaron de tipo de mercancía. Durante el tiempo que la pareja trabajó en la Ciudad de México, también invertían en la construcción de su casa en su comunidad y una vez que quedó lista, regresaron definitivamente a su ciudad natal.

Ahora Dalia vende en un local estable, trabaja todos los días de 9:00 am a 9:00 pm, mientras que Don Marcelo vende los mismos productos pero en las plazas con un puesto ambulante. Con el nuevo préstamo que solicita, comprarán más accesorios para el teléfono como fundas, protectores, micas, pilas, auriculares, etc.  Actualmente, para obtener algunos ingresos extra, tambipen venden algunos artículos de temporada. Una de sus metas es seguir mejorando su vivienda y sobretodo que sus hijos terminen de estudiar una carrera profesional. 

Las demás integrantes del grupo son Mayra quien invertirá en dulces; Alma, en su carpintería; Rosalba, en su puesto de papas; Priscila, en sus bordados y bolsas; María del Carmen, en su panadería; Esperanza en la venta de elotes y Belén, en mayones y ropa interior.

*La fotografía fue tomada en el pequeño patio de Dalia donde aparecen todas las integrantes del grupo mostrando algunos de los artículos que vende Dalia; ella viste una playera de color gris*
texts.en:
The group named Ferrari is made up of hardworking, responsible, and very kind people. Dalia is a woman who is dedicated to her family. She is 37 years old and married to Marcelo. Together they have formed a family with four children, all of whom are school age. 

Over the last 10 years, Dalia and her husband have sold cell phone accessories. They started their life as vendors in the capital of the country (approximately two hours away from their community) selling costume pieces. Later, they noted that the market for cell phone accessories was growing so they changed their merchandise. While Dalia and Marcelo worked in Mexico City, they also invested in the construction of their house in their community. Once it was ready, they returned permanently to the city where they grew up.

Now, Dalia sells her merchandise from a store. She works every day from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. while Marcelo sells the same merchandise out in the plazas with a mobile store front. With this new loan that Dalia is requesting, they will be able to buy more phone accessories such as covers, screen protectors, batteries, headphones, etc. Currently, in order to earn more income, Dalia also sells seasonal items. One of her goals is to keep improving her home and, above all, help her children to finish studying for a professional career. 

The other group members include: Mayra, who will invest in sweets; Alma, who works in carpentry; Rosalba, who sells potatoes; Priscila, who sells embroidery and bags; María del Carmen, who runs a bakery; Esperanza, who sells corn; and Belén, who sells underwear. 

*The photo was take on Dalia's small patio. All of the group members are showing the items Dalia sells. Dalia is wearing a grey jersey.*

loans.use: cell phone accessories such as covers, screen protectors, batteries, headphones, etc.

loans.name: Silvio Javier

texts.es: Silvio Javier: Es un señor de  49 años de edad, amable y sonriente, casado con 4 hijos mayores de edad e independiente. Está solicitando su primer crédito para reparar su vivienda que se encuentra en mal estado, ya que tiene 30 años que no le realiza mejoras. El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar materiales de construcción y pago de mano. Su sueño es establecer un negocio para contar con otra fuente de ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Silvio Javier is 40 years old. He is kind and a happy person. Silvio Javier is married and has four chidlren who are now independent adults. He is requesting his first loan in order to repair his home, which is in need of repairs. It has been 30 years since he has done any repairs. Silvio Javier will use this loan to buy construction materials and to pay for the workers who do the repairs. Silvio Javier's dream is to establish a business so that he will have another source of income with which to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to repair his home, which is in need of repairs.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
Alexander es un hombre de 42 años de edad, vive junto con su esposa en una humilde casa donde tiene como único medio de sostenimiento una pequeña tienda, vendiendo principalmente dulces, galletas y chocolates.
Inicio el negocio como mera necesidad económica y poco a poco ha ido encontrando un posible potencia medio de sostenimiento para él y su esposa.
Ya teniendo un pequeño trecho de recorrido quiere ir aumentando su surtido por ende solicita un crédito para la compra de abarrotes e ir complementando su tienda.
Ayuda a este hombre con tu prestado tendrá mejor surtido, mejorando sus ventas para tener una vida más digna a través del aumento de ventas y ganancias.
texts.en: Alexander is a 42-year-old man. He lives with his wife in a humble house and his only source of income is a small store where he sells mainly candy, cookies, and chocolates. Alexander established the business due to financial need and little by little has been developing the means to support himself and his wife. Having now a bit of experience, he would like to increase his product selection. Thus, he is requesting a loan to buy groceries and complement his business inventory. Your help will support this man to have a better product selection, improve his sales, and live a better life through increased sales and profits.

loans.use: to buy an array of groceries and complement his business inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es:
Trabajador, apasionado, con amor por lo que hace ese es Luis un panadero de 69 años de edad con más de 30 años de experiencia en el mercando, más que certificado para expedir productos de calidad.
Luis es un hombre casado, padre de 3 hijos ellos ya mayores de edad, pero que apoya cada que puede, en su negocio tiene un empleado que es el que atiende y Luis es el encargado de realizar los panes.  
Como en todo negocio se atraviesan momentos difíciles, la falta de capital para comprar materia prima, y algunos implementos que necesita se han convertido en un verdadero dolor de cabeza para Luis, amenazando con acabar con su negocio, pero como no quiere que pase esto, prefiere solicitar ante el bueno corazón y buena disposición de los usuarios de este portal para que lo apoyen para comprar un cilindro de panadería y materia prima para la fabricación de sus legendarios panes.
texts.en: Hard-working, devoted, and full of dedication for his work—that is Luis, a 69-year-old baker with over 30 years of market experience who is more than qualified to bake quality products. Luis is a married man, father of three grown children whom he helps as he is able. His business has one employee who works as a clerk while Luis bakes the bread. As in any business, he has faced difficult times. He lacks cash to purchase raw materials and some needed tools, a situation that has become a real headache for Luis and has threatened to end his business. However, since he is determined not to allow this to happen, he prefers to request a loan from the good-hearted and well-meaning users of this website. Your support will enable him to buy a baking cylinder and raw materials to make his legendary breads.

loans.use: to buy a baking cylinder and an array of raw materials that are urgently needed.

loans.name: Leatulai

texts.en: Leatulai is 52 years old and married with 4 children. She owns and operates a small store, selling a variety of items. She has been doing this for 12 years. Leatulai needs a loan to buy new stock, frozen goods, snacks, canned items, a new freezer, a display fridge and a variety of shoes. She hopes to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She became a member of SPBD in 2003 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy new stock, frozen goods, snacks, canned items, a new freezer, a display fridge and a variety of shoes.

loans.name: Ivapene

texts.en: Ivapene is 49 years old and married with 7 children. She owns and operates a flea market, selling a variety of items, and also owns a taxi to increase her income. She has been doing this for 2 years. Ivapene needs a loan to buy Samoan t-shirts, printed material and some much needed parts for her taxi. She hopes to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses and help with the expansion of her business. She became a member of SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy Samoan t-shirts, printed material and some much needed parts for her taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace 10 años a la agricultura siembra arroz y sorgo y adicional a eso también se dedica a la crianza de ganado, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el joven vive con su esposa y su hijo de 5 meses en casa propia, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
This young man's face is obscured because he is 26 years old and lives in a high-risk zone. He has been farming for 10 years, growing rice and sorghum. He also raises livestock. 

He sells his products in the different markets near his home. The young man lives in his own home with his wife and their five-month-old son.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control etc. to improve the land shown in the photograph in order to be able to continue to work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control etc. to improve his land.

loans.name: Maricris

texts.en:
Maricris is 41 years old and single.

Maricris is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Maricris requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Maricris has been in this business for 2 years now and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Maricris would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Usiano Group

texts.fr: Murebwa est commerçante, membre du groupe de crédits «Usiano», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée a un Chauffeur, âgée de 25 ans, mère de 2 enfants dont 1 étudie et 1 est gosse. Elle commença son business avec de fonds de reçu de ses parents. Elle est vendeuse  des poissons salés dans un marché secondaire de la ville depuis 12 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en poissons. Elle souhaite accroitre son chiffre d’affaires, acheter une parcelle, construire  une maison et scolariser son enfant. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Murebwa is a retailer and a member of the loan group 'Usiano', which is a client of the field partner, Hekima.  She is 25 years old, married to a driver and mother to two children, one of whom attends school, the other is still too young.  She started her business with funds provided by her family.

Murebwa has been selling salted fish in a small market in the town, for twelve years.  She will use her loan to buy more supplies of fish.  She would like to be able to improve her business figures, buy a plot of land, build a house and educate her children.  Murebwa is grateful to Hekima for the support they provide to non-bankable entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy fish for resale.

loans.name: Arman

texts.en:
Arman, with his beloved wife and two nice children, lives in the frontier village Azatamut of the Tavush region. 

Since 2010, Arman has managed to work simultaneously in two jobs and work in agriculture. He works at the frontier troops of his native village and on free days from his work he washes machines at the car service center. Nevertheless, for him his farm is the most important. In his farm, he has cows, calves and chickens. His wife takes care of their small children and also makes the testiest cheese and butter, which she sells to the villagers and customers from their city. Arman on his plot of land cultivates a great range of vegetables such as potatoes, cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, greens and cabbage. He sells mainly through the re-sellers. Arman has plans of enlarging his agricultural activaties so that he will make the assortment of his vegetables greater and his income more as well.

With this loan, Arman will purchase a plot of land and also several pigs for developing a swine breeding farm.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land and also several pigs for developing a swine breeding farm.

loans.name: Eliseo Saul

texts.es: Eliseo de 33 años de edad desde muy joven aprendió a trabajar la tierra, por lo que se dedica a cultivar maíz y frijol desde hace 10 años, con lo que logra obtener mejores ingresos económicos, Eliseo vive con su compañera de vida en casa propia, el desea invertir en insumos para su cultivo para ello solicita un crédito para la compra de fertilizante, abono, control de plaga, herbicidas, semillas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para seguir con sus cultivo con el que espera mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Eliseo is 33 years old. He learned at a very young age to work the land. He has been growing corn and beans for the last 10 years and he is able to earn a better income this way.

Eliseo lives with his life partner in their own home. He hopes to invest in goods for his crops. He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, compost, pest control, herbicides, and seeds to improve the land shown in the photograph. With this he hopes he can continue to grow his crops and better his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, compost, pest control, herbicides, seeds, and to improve the land.

loans.name: Tuimizane A Group

texts.fr: Makala est commerçante, membre de la banque villageoise Tuimizane A, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 42 ans, mère de 4 enfants tous vont à l’école. Elle commença son busines avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse des souliers usagés au marché du centre ville depuis 19 ans. Elle va acheter 300 paires de souliers. Son conjoint est un agent dans un service de contrôle de l’Etat. Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits, construire une maison, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux femmes entrepreneuses non bancables.
texts.en:
Makala is a retailer and a member of the loan group 'Tuimizane A', which is a client of the field partner, Hekima.  She is 42 years old, married and mother to four children, all of whom attend school.  She started her business with funds provided by her husband.

Makala has been selling second-hand shoes in the town centre market, for nineteen years.  She will use her loan to buy 300 pairs of shoes.  Makala's husband works as a civil servant, doing checkups.  In the future, she would like to be able to take out more loans, build a house, and feed and educate her children.  Makala is grateful to Hekima for the support they provide to non-bankable women entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy 300 pairs of shoes for resale.

loans.name: Alliance Group

texts.fr: Pasy est commerçante, membre du groupe de crédits «Alliance», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 25 ans, mère 3 enfants dont 1 étudie et 2 sont encore gosses. Elle commença son business avec de fonds de reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires à domicile dans une avenue de la ville depuis 2 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en farine de manioc, huiles, tomates etc. Elle  souhaite accroitre son chiffre d’affaires,  acheter une parcelle et scolariser ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.Il sied de signaler que certaines clientes portent leurs bébés.
texts.en:
Pasy is a retailer and a member of the loan group 'Alliance', which is a client of the field partner, Hekima.  She is 25 years old, married and mother to three children, one of whom attends school, the other two are still too young.  She started her business with funds provided by her husband.

Pasy has been selling food products from her home on a town avenue, for two years.  She will use her loan to buy cassava flour, oil, tomatoes,etc.  She would like to be able to improve her business figures, buy a plot of land and educate her children.  Pasy is grateful to Hekima for the support they provide to non-bankable entrepreneurs.  

It should be noted that some of the clients in the photo are holding their babies.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour, oil, tomatoes, etc for resale.

loans.name: Esperance

texts.en:
Esperance is 26 years old. She is married with one child  who is six months old. Esperance owns a shop which she has been running for the past six months. 

With the loan, she would like to buy items to sell which include soap, salt and beans. With the profits from the business she plans to buy a goat.

loans.use: To buy more soap, salt and beans to resell.

loans.name: Mizeituni Group

texts.fr: Muhima est commerçante, membre de la banque villageoise «Mizeituni», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée à un maçon, âgée de 27 ans, mère 6 enfants dont 3 étudient et 3 sont gosses. Elle commença son business avec de fonds de reçu de son mari. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires à son domicile  dans une avenue animée de la ville depuis 6 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en 2 sacs de maïs et 2 sacs de manioc. Elle  souhaite acheter une parcelle, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Muhima is a retailer and a member of the loan group 'Mizeituni', which is a client of the field partner, Hekima.  She is 27 years old, married to a mason and mother to six children, three of whom attend school, the other three are still too young.  She started her business with funds provided by her husband.

Muhima has been selling food products from her home on a busy avenue in the town, for six years.  She will use her loan to buy two sacks of maize and two sacks of cassava.  She would like to be able to buy a plot of land, feed and educate her children.  Muhima is grateful to Hekima for the support they provide to non-bankable entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of maize and 2 sacks of cassava for resale.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en:
Vestine is 29 years old. She is married with two children aged 2 and 7 years old; the elder one goes to school. She owns a shop and she has been running this business for past five years, while her husband is a motorcyclist. 

With the loan, she would like to buy items such as spoons, plates and sugar to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: to buy more spoons, plates and sugar to resell.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jackline is 26 years old. She is married with two children aged 4 and 8. Both go to school. She sells used clothes and shoes, and she has been selling them for the past six years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more clothes such as trousers and T-shirts to sell. With the profits from the business, she would like to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: to buy more clothes such as trousers and T-shirts to resell.

loans.name: Regine

texts.en:
Regine is 55 years old. She is married with six children aged between 12 and 34, and they all go to school. She owns a shop and she has been in this business for past three years, while her husband is a driver. 

With the loan, she would like to buy books, soap and buckets to sell. With the profits from the business, she would like to build a house.

loans.use: to buy books, soap and buckets to sell.

loans.name: Victoire

texts.en:
Victoire is 25 years years old. She is married with one child aged 2 months. She sells foodstuffs and she has been in the business for one year.

With the loan, she would like to buy Irish potatoes and green bananas to sell. The profits from the business will be used to improve her business. In the future she aims to earn at least 50,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy Irish potatoes and green bananas to sell.

loans.name: Tuimizane B Group

texts.fr: Byasi est commerçante, membre de la banque villageoise Tuimizane B, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, âgée de 33 ans, femme vaivant seule, mère de 1 enfant qui va à l’école. Elle commença son busines avec de fonds reçu de ses parents. Elle est vendeuse des souliers usagés au marché du centre ville depuis 10 ans. Elle va acheter 85 paires de souliers. Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits, construire une maison, scolariser et nourrir son enfant. Au finish, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Byasi is a retailer and a member of the loan group 'Tuimizane B', which is a client of the field partner, Hekima.  She is 33years old, single and mother to one child who attends school.  She started her business with funds provided by her family.

Byasi has been selling second-hand shoes in the town centre market, for ten years.  She will use her loan to buy 85 pairs of shoes.  She would like to take out more loans, build a house, feed and educate her child.  Byasi is grateful to Hekima for the support they provide to non-bankable entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy 85 pairs of shoes for resale.

loans.name: Jacquiline

texts.en:
Jackline is 48 years old. She is married with four children between the ages of 6 and 26 years.They all go to school. She sells used clothes and she has been selling clothes for the past 15 years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more clothes such as shirts and women's clothes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to build her house. In the future she aims to earn at least 600,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: To buy more clothes such as shirts and women's clothes to resell.

loans.name: Marie Aime

texts.en:
Marie Aimee is 36 years old. She is married with 2 children, ages 2 and 6 years. One goes to school while the other doesn't. 

She has a shop and she has been running this business for the past two years. With the loan, she would like to buy more salt, rice and sugar to sell. 

With the profits from the business she would like to build a house. In the future she hopes to earn at least 50,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more salt, rice and sugar to resell.

loans.name: Emeriene

texts.en:
Emeriene is 34 years old. She is married with 2 children, ages two and eight. The elder child goes to school. 

She sells vegetables such as onions, tomatoes, carrots and berries, and she has been running this business for the past 17 years. Her husband is a local contractor. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more vegetables to sell, and with the profits from the business she plans to construct her own house.

loans.use: To buy more carrots, onions and tomatoes.

loans.name: Sophonie

texts.en:
Sophonie is 35 years old. She is married with two children, ages 5 and 6 years. They both go to school. 

She owns a shop and she has been in the business for 15 years. Her husband is a businessman. 

With the loan Sophonie would like to buy sugar, rice and biscuits to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a piece of land. In the future, she aims to earn at least 200,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice and biscuits to sell.

loans.name: Violette

texts.en:
Violette is 43 years old. She is married with 8 children between the ages of 8 and 26, and all of them go to school. She has a shop and she has been in this business for the past 8 years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, Irish potatoes, beans and salt to sell. With the profits from the business, she plans to build her own house. In the future Violette hopes to make profits of 60,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: To buy more rice and Irish potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Marie Jose

texts.en:
Marie José is 29 years old. She owns a shop and she has been in business for past 2 years. Her husband is a local contractor. 

With the loan, she would like to buy shoe polish, biscuits and sugar to sell. The profits from the business will be used to build a house. 

In the future, she aims to earn at least 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: To buy more shoe polish, biscuits and sugar to resell.

loans.name: Marie Rose

texts.en:
Marie Rose is 37 years old. She is married with four children aged between 9 and 15 years.They all go to school. She sells vegetables and she has been in the business for 5 years while her husband works in a hotel.

With the loan, she would like to buy shallots, ground-nuts and onions to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a piece of land. In future she aims to earns 120,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more shallots, ground-nuts and onions to sell.

loans.name: Liberathe

texts.en:
Liberathe is 33 years old. She is married with two children aged between 12 and 14 years. They all attend school. She sells vegetables and has been in business for 10 years.

With the loan, she would like to buy more vegetables such as tomatoes and cabbages for sale. The profits from the business will be used to buy a house. She would like to improve her business in order to become a wholesaler in future.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables like cabbages and tomatoes for sale.

loans.name: Francoise

texts.en:
Francoise is 33 years old. She is married with two children, aged 1 and 5 years. One child goes to school. She is a wholesaler of charcoal, and she has been in a business for five years, while her husband is a businessman. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more charcoal to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a piece of land. In the future, she aims to earn 200,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is 30 years old. She is married with two young children aged 1 and 3 years. She is a tailor and she has been in a business for four years, while her husband is a driver. 

With the loan, she would like to buy a tailoring machine. The profits from the business will be used to build a business place. In the future, she aims to earn at least 50,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy a tailoring machine

loans.name: Bernadette

texts.en:
Bernadette is 46 years old. She is married with five children aged between 5 and 20 years; all of them go to school. She sells soft drinks and has been in a business for 14 years, while her husband is a mechanic. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more banana juice to resell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and make some savings, as well. She plans to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy green banana juice to sell.

loans.name: Speciose

texts.en:
Speciose is 53 years old. She is married with three children aged between 19 and 35 years. One of them goes to school. She sells vegetables and has been in business for 6 years.

With the loan, she would like to buy more vegetables such as tomatoes, collards and soya beans for sale. The profits from the business will be used to buy land. She would like to improve her business to become a wholesaler in future.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Eline

texts.en:
Eline is 30 years old. She is married with a 3-year-old child. She sells charcoal, and she has been selling charcoal for the past two years, while her husband is a mechanic.

With the loan, she would like to buy more charcoal to sell. With the profits from the business, she plans to buy a piece of land in which she could build a house. In the future, she hopes to save her profits until they are 2 million and later on have a bigger investment.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Francine

texts.en:
Francine is aged 39 years. She is married with four children aged between 7 and 15 years. They all go to school. She sells local drinks and she has been in the business for five years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more sugar and sorghum. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children. In the future, she aims to earn 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more sugar and sorghum

loans.name: Dative

texts.en:
Dative is 29 years old. She is married with one child, age three. The child does not yet go to school. 

Dative owns a bar and she has been in business for the past two years, while her husband is a technician. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more beer to sell. The profits from the business will be used to build a house.

In the future, she aims to earn RWF 100,000 per month.

loans.use: to buy more beer to sell.

loans.name: Anastasie

texts.en:
Anastasie is 31 years old. She is married with two children who are seven and eight years old. Both children attend school. 

Anastasie owns a shop and has been in business for three years. Her husband is a businessman. With the loan, she would like to buy more items such as sugar and salt to sell. The profits will be used to expand her business, and she plans to start saving money with her business.

loans.use: To buy more items such as sugar and salt to sell.

loans.name: Terencia

texts.es: Terencia de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica desde hace 4 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz, frijol, maicillo y arroz cuando ya está su cosecha la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarla en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Terencia, aged 54, lives in her own home with her spouse and daughter. For four years she has farmed corn, beans, sorghum and rice. Once the harvest is brought in, she stores it in silos like the one shown in the photo, in order to then sell it in neighboring villages, in which she already has many regular customers. 

She is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control, and herbicides etc. to be able to continue with her farming, which is her only sauce of work, in order to have a larger income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control, and herbicides etc.

loans.name: Charlotte

texts.en:
Charlotte is 24 years old. She is not married. 

She sells building materials and she has been in business for three years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more cement, metal, and iron sheets to sell. The profits from the business will be used to expand her business and she would like to become a wholesaler in the future.

loans.use: to buy more cement, metal, and iron sheets to sell.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.en:
Claudia is age 42. She is married with four children between the ages of 7 and 20 years. They all go to school. Her husband is a bus driver.

Claudia sells foodstuffs and has been in the business for 3 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more green bananas and tomatoes to sell. 

The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house, and in the future she wants to earn 500,000 francs per month.

loans.use: To buy more bananas and tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is age 45. She is married with five children between the ages of 6 and 20 years. They all go to school. Her husband is a bus driver.

She is a tailor and has been in the business for 25 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more clothes for men and women for tailoring. 

The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house. In the future, Florence wishes to buy more tailoring machines in order to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for men and women for tailoring.

loans.name: Ntabugi Joseline

texts.en:
Joselyne is 25 years old. She is married with a one-year-old child. She runs a shop and she has been running this business for the past year. 

With the loan, she would like to buy soap, salt, Irish potatoes and beans to sell. With the profits from the business she plans to improve the family's living standards.

loans.use: To buy more soap, salt and beans to sell.

loans.name: Elizeus

texts.en:
Elizeus is 28 years old. He is not married. He sells foodstuffs and he has been in a business for 7 years. 

With the loan, he would like to buy more Irish potatoes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy land. 

In the future, Elizeus would like get 6,000 francs per month as profit.

loans.use: To buy more Irish potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Odette

texts.en:
Odette is 32 years old. She is married with two children, ages 2 and 8. One of them goes to school.

Odette sells house paint and she has been doing this business for the last 3 years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy a variety of paints to sell. With accumulated profits from the business, she plans to buy a house.

In the future, she aims to make at least 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: To buy more paints to sell.

loans.name: Marie Louise

texts.en:
Marie Louise is 35 years old. She is married with a nine-month-old child. She runs a shop and she has been running this business for the past four years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more retail shop items, such as sugar and salt to sell.

With the profits from the business, Marie Louise plans to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: To buy more sugar and salt to resell.

loans.name: Seraphine

texts.en:
Seraphine is age 39. She is married with three children between the ages of 10 and 12 years. They all go to school. Her husband is a local carpenter.

She sells clothes and has been in the business for 5 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more clothes to sell. 

The profits from the business will be used to build a house and pay school fees for her children.

In the future, Seraphine would like to increase her business by 90%.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos es un responsable hombre de 38 años de edad, independiente, llevado de su forma de ser, amigable, compartido y que le gusta manejar su propio tiempo, por ello se desempeña como independiente vendiendo mercancía de productos de uso personal, como cremas de manos, productos capilares, producto de aseo, cremas dentales, entre otros, siendo esta fuerza de venta el principal sustento para su familia conformada por su hijo de 18 años de edad y su pareja.
Entre sus proyecciones de vida, están tener una vivienda propia, que su hijo estudie, sostenibilidad del negocio, tener un local propio varios sueños en los que ha venido trabajando y en los que necesita apoyo para poder materializarlos, apoyo que sería capital de trabajo para surtirse de productos.
El tema principal es que la empresa donde se abastece no es nacional y necesita hacer pagos puntuales para que le den cada vez más mercancía y siga por su buena ruta de trabajo donde ha venido mejorando su calidad y donde espera darle estudio a su hijo y florecer en este año 2015.
texts.en:
Carlos is a responsible, independent 38-year-old man, led by his friendly and generous nature. He likes to manage his own time, therefore he works independently selling merchandise--products for personal use, like hand lotion, hair products, cleaning products, toothpaste, among others. His sales are the mainstay of his family, comprised of his 18-year-old son and his partner. 

Among his life plans are those of owning his own home, having his son study, having a sustainable business, and having his own shop. These are various dreams he has been working toward and he needs support to be able to make them realities--support in the form of capital in order to stock up on the products. The main issue is that the company that supplies the products is not domestic, and he needs to make punctual payments so that they will continue to give him more merchandise and so that he may continue along his good work path, where he has improved the quality and where he hopes to send his son to school and flourish in 2015.

loans.use: to purchase products like hand lotion, hair products, cleaning products, toothpaste, among others.

loans.name: Shamshod

texts.ru: Шамшод мужчина 28 лет, женат, молодой отец троих детей. После окончания школы, Шамшод не смог поступить в университет.Он решил заняться делом. Несмотря на свой молодой возраст, Шамшод решил открыть свой бизнес. Он начал заниматься животноводством. На своем участке земли Шамшод ухаживает за крупным рогатым скотом. У него в стаде 3 коровы и один теленок, который только недавно родился. Шамшод бережно ухаживает за недавно родившимся теленком, сам кормит его из бутылочки молоком. Молоко, полученное от дойки коров жена Шамшода относит на рынок для продажи. Сейчас Шамшод планирует закупить корм для скота. Но у него нет полной суммы денег. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Шамшод заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Shamshod is a 28-year-old man, who is married and a father of three children. Shamshod could not get accepted to a university after completing school. He decided to get involved in business. Despite his young age, Shamshod decided to start his own business. He became involved in animal husbandry. Shamshod takes care of cattle on his land. He has a herd of 3 cows and a recently-born calf. Shamshod carefully cares for the newborn calf and feeds him milk from a bottle himself. Shamshod's wife sells the milk obtained from the cows at a market. Now Shamshod is planning to buy livestock feed, but does not have enough money.
