This is why he came to MDO Arvand for the financial support. Shamshod is grateful in advance for the support and trust.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed

loans.name: Gilsara

texts.ru: Гулсара, 50 лет, замужем, имеет 3 сыновей. Работает уборщицей в школе, общий трудовой стаж более 20 лет. Ежемесячная заработная плата - 3,400 сом (KGS). Супруг Гулсары работает охранником, получая около 2,600 сом (KGS). Гулсара решила отремонтировать крышу дома, так как старая совсем прохудилась, поэтому она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку шифера. Таким образом она обезопасит и утеплит свой дом. Свои доходы же Гулсара планирует и дальше вкладывать в улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en:
Gilsara is 50 years old, married, and has three sons. She works as a cleaner in a school, with a length of service of more than 20 years. Her monthly wage is 3,400 som (KGS). Gilsara's husband works as a guard, receiving about 2,600 som (KGS). Gilsara decided to renovate the roof of her home, since it is very old and leaks. Therefore, she applied to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to buy slates. In this manner, she will protect and insulate her home.

Gilsara plans to invest her income in further improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase slate in order to replace her old roof.

loans.name: Manzura

texts.ru: Это женщина Манзура. Она жительница района Спитамен.  Ей 47 лет. Она замужем и имеет детей. Манзура уже более 15 лет занимается животноводством. Она опытная женщина на районе. Манзура хорошо знает, как надо ухаживать за скотам. Она ухаживает скота у себя в коровнике. Животноводческая деятельность является основной источником дохода. Доход который она получает, обеспечивает семью. Сейчас у нее осталось мало скотин. Она не хочет потерять источник дохода. По этой причине Манзура берет кредит, чтобы купить скотин, увеличить поголовья скотов и продвигаться дальше
texts.en: This woman is Manzura. She is a resident of the Spitamen region. She is 47 years old. She is married and has children. For more than 15 years, Manzura has been raising livestock. She is an experienced woman in this area. Manzura knows well how to take care of livestock. She tends livestock near her home in a cowshed. Livestock raising activities are the main source of income. The income she earns is used to care for her family. Now she has few livestock remaining. She does not want to lose the source of income. For this reason, Manzura is taking a loan in order to buy livestock, to increase her livestock count, and to move forward.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Damiana

texts.es: Doña Damiana tiene 60 años de edad y se dedica desde hace 20 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra en la fotografía para luego comercializarla en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con sus dos hijos y sus tres nietos en casa propia, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Damiana, aged 60, has worked in farming for 20 years. She sows corn and beans, and when the harvest is brought in, she stores it in the silos shown in the photo, to then sell in the different markets near her home.

She lives with her two children and three grandchildren in her own home. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control etc. to be able to continue her work and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control etc.

loans.name: Abdugappor

texts.ru: Это Абдугаппор. Ему 65 лет. Он проживает в районе Спитамен с женой, сыном, невесткой и внуком.  У нее хорошая и счастливая семья. Он ответственный человек. Абдугаппор занимается растениеводством. Этим видом деятельности она занят уже более 3 лет, и в этом ему помогает семья. Он выращивает рис и кукурузник. Абдугаппор решил начать новый бизнес в сфере животноводства. Он хочет купить мелко рогатых скотов и будет заниматься купле продажей скотин. Чтобы начать бизнес у него не хватает денежных средств, и он обратился за кредитом. Абдугаппор может начать успешный бизнес и это кредит поможет ему достичь своей цели.
texts.en:
This is Abdugappor. He is 65 years old. He resides in the Spitament region with his wife, son, daughter-in-law and grandson. He has a kind and happy family. He is a responsible person. Abdugappor raises crops. He has been involved in this type of activity for more than three years, and in this way helps his family. He grows rice and corn. Abdugappor decided to start a new business in the sphere of livestock raising. He wants to buy short-horned livestock and in the future to buy and sell them.

He has insufficient funds to start a business and he applied for a loan. Abdugappor can start a successful business and this loan will help him to reach his goals.

loans.use: to take on a new activity and purchase short-horned livestock.

loans.name: Angelique

texts.en:
Angelique is age 22. She is married, with one child, seven years old. She goes to school. 

Angelique owns a shop and has been in a business for one year, while her husband is a businessman. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more sugar, soap, and biscuits to sell. The profits from the business will be used to expand her business. 

In the future, Angelique aims to be a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, soap, and biscuits to sell.

loans.name: Godelive

texts.en:
Godelive is age 26 years. She is married with two children, ages 4 and 6 years. They both go to school. Her husband is a bus driver. 

She owns a mini-market and has been in the business for 3 years. With the loan, Godelive would like to buy more items to sell, such as milk and bread. 

The profits from the business will be used to get a big supermarket, and she wishes to expand her business up to 1,000,000 francs.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell, such as milk and bread, in order to increase her business.

loans.name: Mariya

texts.ru: Мария 62 года, вдова, мать 4 детей. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Мария занимается животноводством, начав свой бизнес в 1985 году. Благодаря упорному труду Марии, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 4 коровы, 20 овец и 2 лошади. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 21,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь, поэтому она решила развивать свой бизнес и в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Мария обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 коров для откорма. Вырученные доходы от бизнеса Мария планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и накопить на строительство нового дома.
texts.en: Mariya is 62 years old, a widow and a mother of 4 children. To provide the primary income for her family, Mariya has been involved in animal husbandry since 1985. Thanks to Mariya's hard work, today her farm contains 4 cows, 20 sheep and 2 horses. The monthly income amounts to about 21,000 som (KGS), but because this money is not enough for a decent life, she decided to expand her business. To further develop her business, Mariya requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy 3 cows for fattening up. Mariya plans to invest the earnings from the business into further increasing her livestock headcount and saving money to build a new house.

loans.use: to buy 3 cows for fattening up and subsequent resale in order to grow her business and income

loans.name: Abdullojon

texts.ru: Абдуллочон мужчина 40 лет, женат, отец троих детей. Вот уже на протяжение двадцати с лишним лет он занимается животноводством. После окончания школы, Абдуллочон решил не поступать в университет, и начал работать, чтобы помогать родителям. Сейчас на его участке земли пасётся 3 коровы и 5 баранов. Абдуллочон очень любит свое  дело, ему нравится находиться на свежем воздухе. В его делах помогает ему жена. АБдуллочон работает с утра до вечера, чтобы заработать денег и обеспечить свою семью и детей хорошим будущим. Абдуллочон обратился в МДО Арванд за получением кредита в целях расширения поголовья своего скота. Абдуллочон надеется, что МДО Арванд одобрит его заявку и выделит нужную ему сумму.Благодарит за доверие и помощь.
texts.en: Abdullojon is a man of 40, is married, and is the father of three children. Over the last 20 years, he has been engaged in raising livestock. After graduating high school, Abdullojon decided not to enroll in a university and to begin working in order to help his parents. Now, on his plot of land he tends three cows and five sheep. Abdullojon likes his work very much. He likes to be out in the clean air. His wife helps him in his activities. Abdullojon works from morning until evening in order to earn a living and to support his family and children with a good future. Abdullojon applied to MDO Arvand for a loan with the aim of expanding his livestock count. Abdullojon hopes that MDO Arvand will approve his request and will provide the needed amount. He is grateful for the trust and support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Cholponai

texts.ru: Чолпонай, 41 год, замужем, мать 2 детей. Чолпонай в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, занимается сельским хозяйством. Стартовав 23 года назад, на сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Чолпонай есть 10 коров и 10 овец.  Ежемесячная прибыль- около 10,000 сомов (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Чолпонай обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 овец. Доходы от кредита Чолпонай планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса, что поможет в будущем накопить на строительство жилого дома.
texts.en: Cholponai is 41 years old, married and a mother of 2 children. To provide the primary income for her family, Cholponai is involved in agriculture. After starting this business 23 years ago, today her farm contains 10 cows and 10 sheep. The monthly profit amounts to about 10,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Cholponai requested a loan in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy 4 sheep. Cholponai plans to invest the earnings from the loan into continued business development, which will help her save money to repair her house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase four sheep for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Bahtiyar

texts.ru: Бахтияр мужчина 35 лет, женат, отец четверых детей. Он вырос в сельской местности, закончил школу и начал работать, чтобы помогать родителям. Он хотел поступить в технический институт, но не получилось, так как не было денег для оплаты университета. Поэтому Бахтияр остался жить с родителями. В возрасте 20 лет после женитьбы, он начал заниматься собственным бизнесом-купле-продажей крупного рогатого скота. Сейчас у Бахтияра в стаде пятнадцать баранов, три корова и одна коза. Он откармливает скот и продаёт его. Бахтияр привык работать на свежем воздухе, ухаживать за животными. Он обратился в МДО Арванд за получением кредита в целях расширения поголовья своего скота.  Бахтияр заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Bahtiyar is a 35-year-old man and a father of four children. He grew up in a rural area, graduated from school and started to work in order to help his parents. He wanted to go to a technical college, but could not because there was no money to pay for the tuition. This is why Bahtiyar stayed with his parents. At the age of 20, after getting married, he started his own business in reselling cattle. Now Bahtiyar's herd contains fifteen sheep, three cows and one goat. He fattens up and resells livestock. Bahtiyar got used to working in the fresh air and taking care of the livestock. He came to MDO Arvand to request a loan in order to increase his livestock headcount. Bahtiyar is grateful in advance for the support and trust.

loans.use: to increase his livestock headcount

loans.name: Olive

texts.en: Olive, aged 28, is married and has two children aged 1 and 3 years.Her children don't go to school. Her husband is a policeman. Olive sells food stuffs and has been in the business for 3 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more Irish potatoes and cassava leaves for sale. The profits from the business will be used to buy a house. In the future she would like to earn at least 300,000 per month.

loans.use: to buy more Irish potatoes and cassava leaves for sale.

loans.name: Jeanne

texts.en: Jeanne is aged 25. She is married with two children, aged 4 and 8 years. Her children both attend school. Her husband is a mechanic. Jeanne sells charcoal and has been in the business for 2 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more charcoal to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a piece of land and In future she would like to improve her business to the extent of 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Aynabad

texts.ru:
Айнабад 54 летняя жительница района Шахритус. Она замужем и имеет детей. Ее муж занимается земледелием, где арендует земельный участок. Айнабад сама ведет швейное дело у себя дома. Она шьет женскую национальную одежду. В швейном деле ей нравится ежедневный доход. 
Айнабад хочет начать новый бизнес животноводство. У нее есть коровник и корм для скота. Ей надо купить крупнорогатого скота и начать деятельность. Она планирует покупать скотов, откармливать несколько месяцев, потом продавать их на скотном рынке. Для начала данной операции у нее недостаточно средств. Из-за нехватки средств она берет кредит. Запрашиваемый кредит является шансом для Айнабад, чтобы улучшить жизненные условия семьи. Поддержите ее.
texts.en:
Aynabad is a 54-year-old resident of the Shahrituz region. She is married and has children. Her husband is engaged in agriculture, where he rents a plot of land. Aynabad herself conducts sewing work out of her home. She sews women's national clothing. She likes her daily income from her sewing work.

Aynabad wants to start a new business raising livestock. She has a barn and feed for livestock. She needs to buy cattle and to start her activities. She plans to buy cattle, to fatten them over a few months, then sell them at the livestock market. She has insufficient funds to start this operation and she will take out a loan. The requested loan will be a chance for Aynabad to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Valentine

texts.en: Valentine is 28 years. She is not married. She owns a shop and she has been in the business for 2 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more salt,sugar and cooking oil to sell. The profits from the business will be used to expand her business. In future she would like to pay back the loan and remain with some profits.

loans.use: To buy more salt, sugar and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Gloria Luz

texts.es:
Ella es Gloria una tierna joven de 21 años de edad, trabajadora, emprendedora, luchadora, responsable, madre de una pequeña de 4 meses de edad, que es su adoración y motivo para superarse cada día pensando en darle el mejor futuro que este a su alcance.
Ella desea iniciar un negocio de confección, pero no puede hacerlo sola, necesita de tu apoyo, ella es humilde, nadie mejor que ella sabe que de momento no tiene capital pero con ese primer empujón que puedes o no darle, tomara vuelo para no aterrizar, proyectando un negocio prospero que genere empleo.
Con el apoyo que busca quiere comprar una maquina fileteadora, y recubridora, vamos anímate, ayudala!
texts.en:
Gloria is a young woman who is 21 years old. She is hardworking, enterprising, tenacious, and responsible. She is a mother of a young four month old daughter, who she adores and is her reason for overcoming every day, thinking of giving her the best future in her power.

She wants to start a business making clothing, but can't do it alone. She needs your support and is humble. Nobody knows better than her that currently she has no capital but with this first push she can take off and never come down. She is projecting a prosperous business that generates employment.

With your support she wants to buy a sewing machine. Let's go, help her out!

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine. Let's go, help her out!

loans.name: Dinara

texts.ru: Динара, 43 года, есть 3 детей, замужем. Образование у Динары среднее, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад с 3,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Динары, на данный момент в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 дойной коровы,18 овец, 3 лошади и 60 пчелиных ульев. Ежемесячный доход составляет примерно 31,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Динара обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров. Доходы от кредита Динара планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en: Dinara is 43 years old, married and has 3 children. Dinara has a secondary education and, to provide additional income for her family, is involved in animal husbandry, having started this business 20 years ago with 3,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Dinara's hard work, at the present time her farm contains 2 dairy cows, 18 sheep, 3 horses and 60 beehives. Her monthly income amounts to about 31,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Dinara requested a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy cows. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional cows in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Milliam

texts.en: Milliam, aged 52 years, is married with eight children aged between 18 and 30 years. Five of her children go to school. She sells foodstuffs and she has been running this business for 20 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more maize flour and cooking oil to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a piece of land. In future she aims to earn at least 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more maize flour and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Marie Louise

texts.en: Marie Louise is 32 years old. She is married with four children, aged between 2 and 9 years. Three of her children go to school. Her husband is a businessman. Marie Louise owns a shop and she has been in the business for 1 year. With the loan, she would like to buy items such as: rice, maize flour and cooking oil to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house. In future she would like earn at least 250,000 RWF per month as a profit.

loans.use: to buy items such as: rice, maize flour and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Immaculee

texts.en: Immaculee is 30 years old. She is married with three children aged between 10 and 13 years, who all go to school. She sells Irish potatoes on a retail scale and has been in a business for one year. With the loan, she would like to buy over 20 sacks of Irish potatoes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children. In the future, she plans to expand her Irish potatoes business.

loans.use: to buy more Irish potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Beatha

texts.en: Beatha is 40 years old. She is married with six children aged between 5 and 18 years, who all go to school. She sells green bananas and has been running this business for 31 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more green bananas to sell. With the profits from the business, she will improve her standard of living and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more bananas to resell.

loans.name: Cleotilde

texts.es:
Cleotilde es una mujer que trabaja con la mente puesta en un futuro mejor para sus hijos, es por ello que día a día se esfuerza para alcanzar sus metas, ella tiene 46 años vive junto a su esposo en una comunidad de Sololá.
Cleotilde es una mujer que le gusta la costura, pues desde hace 15 años ella decidió buscar una actividad para ayudar a su esposo para sacar adelante a sus 3 hijos que están estudiando. Pues ella ahora se dedica a la elaboración de bordados en blusas típicas para luego venderlas en su misma comunidad. Con las pocas ganancias que genera en el negocio ella ayuda a su esposo a contribuir a los gastos de la familia, Cleotilde ama tanto a sus hijos  que lo único que quiere ella  es que sus hijos tengan todo lo necesario pero el problema que tiene ella es que sus hijos no cuenta con una computadora, por tal motivo ella solicita un prestamo que le servirá para comprar una computadora
El sueño de Cleotilde  es ver a sus hijos graduarse para que puedan construir una casamejor.
texts.en:
Cleotilde works with the thought of obtaining a better future for her children. That is why she works hard every day to achieve her goals. She is 46 years old and lives with her husband in the community of Solola. 

Cleotilde likes sewing. 15 years ago, she decided to find an activity to help her husband support their three children, who are in school. She now works embroidering traditional shirts, which she sells in her community. With the small earnings generated by her business, she helps cover the family expenses. Cleotilde loves her children profoundly and what she most wants is for them to have all they need. Her children do not have a computer, which is why she is requesting a loan to purchase one. 

Cleotilde's dream is to see her children graduate so that they can build a better house.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Kuysun

texts.ru: Куйсун 56 лет  у нее высшее образование. Она работает директором школы. Куйсун получила хорошее образование и теперь пожинает плоды своего труда. Она всегда твердит что знания это сила и старается  помочь  делом и советом всем кто стремится к знаниям. Её дети уже выросли  и  благодаря родителям тоже получили хорошее образование. Она одна из тех которые  несут знания в массы. Вот и теперь Куйсун хочет помочь племяннику получить образование. Взяв кредит с «Арванд» она хочет оплатить учебу племянника. Надеется что ей не откажут и заранее благодарить за поддержку.
texts.en: Kuysun is 56 years old and has a college education. She works as a school principal. Kuysun obtained good education and now gathers the fruits of her labor. She always says that knowledge is power and tries to help everyone who strives for knowledge with action and advice. Her children already grew up and, thanks to the parents, also obtained good education. She is one of those people who pass her knowledge to the masses. And now Kuysun wants to help her nephew obtain an education. She wants to pay for her nephew's education with a loan from Arvand. She hopes that her request will not be refused and is grateful for the support in advance.

loans.use: to pay for her nephew's education

loans.name: Arnulfo

texts.es: Arnulfo: Es un joven luchador de 27 años de edad, de la etnia miskita, originario de Puerto Cabezas, casado con un pequeño hijo de 2 meses. Es un joven que lucha día a día para poder superarse y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar una bicicleta, que utilizara como medio de transporte y construir un cuarto de madera para su familia, ya que actualmente habitan en casa de familiares. El y su esposa sueñan con tener su propia vivienda de concreto (cemento) porque es de mayor durabilidad.
texts.en: Arnulfo is a hardworking 27-year-old of the Miskita ethnicity. He comes from the town of Puerto Cabezas, is married and has a 2-month-old baby. He is a young man who works every day to get ahead in life and improve his family's living conditions. He is requesting his first loan to buy a bike, which he will use as his means of transportation, and to build a wooden room for his family, as they currently live with relatives. His dream and that of his wife is to have their own home made of cement, as it is more durable.

loans.use: to buy a bike and build a wooden room.

loans.name: Florida

texts.en: Florida is 44 years old. She is married with three children aged between 6 months and 5 years. She sells food stuffs and has been in a business for 15 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more sorghum to sell. The profits from the business will be used to increase her business. In the future, she wishes to be a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy more sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Drocelle

texts.en:
Drocelle is 28 years old. She is married with 2 children, aged 2 and 6 years. They are currently not in school.  

Drocelle sells food stuffs and has been running her business for 4 years now. With the loan she's requested, she would like to buy more beans to sell. 

The profits from Drocelle's business will be used to renovate her house. In the future she wishes to earn at least 5,000,000 RWF per year.

loans.use: to buy more beans to sell.

loans.name: Jyambere Group

texts.en: Ancille is 42 years old. She is married with five children aged between 2 and 13 years, four of whom go to school. She is a group leader of JYAMBERE, which means “PLAN FOR FUTURE” in English.  She sells foodstuffs, and she has been in business for four years. With the loan, she would like to buy more onions, cassava and vegetables for sale. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house. In the future, she wishes to triple her business.

loans.use: to buy more onions, cassava and vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Claire

texts.en: Claire is 35 years old. She is married with five children aged between 1.5 and 10 years. She owns a shop and has been in business for 10 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar and salt to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house. In the future, she aims to earn at least 5,000,000 RWF.

loans.use: To buy more rice, sugar and salt to resell.

loans.name: Assouma

texts.en: Assouma, aged 33 years. is married with four children, aged between 1 and 12 years. Three of her children go to school. Assouma sells meat and she has been in business for 5 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more meat to sell. The profits from the business will be used to to pay school fees for her children. She plans to increase her savings in future.

loans.use: to buy more meat to sell.

loans.name: Diane

texts.en:
Diane is 26 years old. She is married with two children aged 3 and 4 years. Both of her children go to school.  

Diane sells clothes and has been in a business for 5 years, while her husband is a business man. With the loan, she would like to buy more clothes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ezechiel

texts.en: Ezechiel is 34 years old. He is married with one child, 1 year old. He owns a salon and has been in the business for 3 years. With the loan, he would like to buy more equipment such as combs, chairs and machines for using in his beauty salon. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and renovate his house. In future plan he wishes to earn at least 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more equipment such as combs, chairs and machines for using in her beauty salon.

loans.name: Abanyamurava Group

texts.en:
ABANYAMURAVA is a group led by Haliette who is 32 years old. The group name means “courageous” in English.

Haliette sells clothes and has been in a business for 8 years. The group members sell different items and they have the same idea for changing their life. With the loan, she would like to buy more trousers, shirts and t-shirts to resell. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standards of living.

loans.use: to buy more trousers, shirts and t-shirts to resell.

loans.name: Marie Claire

texts.en:
Marie Claire is 27 years old. She is married with 3 children aged between 9 and 12 years. All of the children go to school. 

Marie Claier owns a shop and she has been in a business for 10 years, while her husband is a business man. With the loan, she would like to buy more sugar, rice and maize powder to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, rice and maize powder to resell.

loans.name: Claudette

texts.en:
Claudette aged 36. She is married with one child who is 4 years old. She did not go to school. Her husband is a soldier.

Claidette owns a shop and she has been in business for one year. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar and beans to sell. The profits from the business will used to save for the same business. She plans to increase her business to the extent of doubling it.

loans.use: to buy more  rice, sugar and beans to sell.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is aged 30. She is married with one child who is four years old. She didn't go to school. She owns a shop and has been in a business for thirteen years, while her husband is a businessman.

With the loan, she would like to buy more skirts, dresses, and jackets to sell.

The profits from the business will be used to save in the same business. In the future, she aims to earn 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more skirts, dresses, and jackets to sell.

loans.name: Laurence

texts.en:
Laurence is 44 years old. She is married with 2 children, aged 6 and 7 years, both going to school.  

Laurence sells food stuffs and has been in a business for 14 years, while her husband is a farmer. With the loan, she would like to buy more beans and sorghum to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children. In future, she aims to earn at least 200,000 RWF monthly.

loans.use: to buy more beans and sorghum to resell.

loans.name: Dedaciene

texts.en: Dedaciene is a 30 year old mother with two children who are ages 2 and 4 years. With the previous loan, she bought shoes to sell and she has been in a business for 7 years. With the profits, together with this loan, she plans to buy food stuffs to sell, which include beans and Sorghum. From the sales, she will have profits with which she plans to make some savings and be able to enlarge her capital to ten million in the future.

loans.use: to buy food stuffs to sell.

loans.name: Athanasie

texts.en: Athanasie is 39 years old, married with five children aged between 6 and 17 years. Her children all go to school. Athanasie's husband is a soldier and she owns a mini market. She has been in a business for 2 years. With the loan requested, she would like to buy more items such as bread, juice, milk and snacks to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption and she wishes to earn at least 3 times.

loans.use: to buy more items such as bread, juice, milk and snacks to sell.

loans.name: Marceline

texts.en:
Marceline is 36 years old. She is married with 3 children aged between 2 and 9 years; two of them go to school. 

Marceline owns a shop and she has been in a business for 5 years, while her husband is a driver. With the loan, she would like to buy items such as: rice, lotion and sugar to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children. In future she wishes to earn at least 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more rice, lotion and sugar to resell.

loans.name: Valentine

texts.en: Valentine is 40 years old, married with four children aged between 7 and 20 years. Her children all go to school. Valentine's husband is a pastor while she works as a tailor and has been in business for 3 years. With the loan, she would like to buy her own machines for tailoring. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and she wishes to improve her business at least 2 times.

loans.use: to buy her own machines for tailoring.

loans.name: Angelique

texts.en: Angelique is 33 years old. She is married with 3 children aged between 2 and 8 years, two of whom go to school. Angelique owns a shop and has been in a business for 3 years. With the loan, she would like to buy rice, sugar and cooking oil to sell. The profits from the business will be used to save and improve her business to the extent of 3 times.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en:
Claudine is 24 years old. She is married with 2 children, aged 9 months and 4 years. Her children do not go to school. 

Claudine sells charcoal and has been in a business for 2 years while her husband is farmer. With the loan, she would like to buy more charcoal and firewood to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house. In future she aims to earn at least 200,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal and firewood to sell.

loans.name: Ildephonse

texts.en: Ildephonse is aged 43. He is married with three children aged between 5 and 11 years. They all go to school. He sells bricks and has been in a business for 4 years. With the loan, he would like to buy more bricks to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more bricks to sell.

loans.name: Emerthe

texts.en:
Emerthe is 48 years old. She is married with five children aged between 2 has 22 years. All of her children go to school. 

Emerthe owns a bar and she has been in a business for one years, while her husband is a motorist. With the loan, she would like to buy more soda and beer to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more soda and beer to sell.

loans.name: Therese

texts.en: Therese is 55 years old, married with three children aged between 17 and 33 years. They all go to school. She sells snacks and she has been in a business for one year, while her husband is a business man. With the loan requested, she would like to buy the different items such as baking powder, cooking oil and margarine to sell. She would like to renovate her house from the profits and would like her business to increase to the extent of 4 times. In future she is aiming to earn at least 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy the different items such as baking powder, cooking oil and margarine to sell.

loans.name: Abakundanye Group

texts.en:
Consolee is a group leader, and is aged 48. She is married with five children aged between 1.5 and 13 years. The group is called Abakundanye, which means “Beloved one” in English. They sell different products, and they wish to expand their businesses for changing their future for the better.

Consolee owns a shop and has been in a business for eight years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar, biscuits, and soaps for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar, biscuits, and soaps for sale.

loans.name: Laurence

texts.en:
Laurence is aged 51. She is married with four children aged between 13 and 32 years. They all go to school. She owns a shop and has been in business for 18 years, while her husband is a businessman.

With the loan, she would like to buy more items such as sugar, cooking oil, and salt for sale.

The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children. In the future, she aims to earn at least 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more items such as sugar, cooking oil, and salt for sale.

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en:
Alphonsine is aged 44, a mother of ten children, ages between 5 and 23 years. her children all go to school. 

Alphonsine owns a shop and she has been in a business for 10 years. With the loan requested, she would like to buy more biscuits, rice and cooking oil for resale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and to buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy more biscuits, rice and cooking oil for resale.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.en: Fidele is 24 years old and not yet married. He owns a shop and has been in business for 3 years. With this loan, he would like to buy rice, sugar, baking powder and cooking oil to sell. The profits from the business will be used to save and improve his business up to 3 times. In the future, he wishes to earn at least 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, baking powder and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Zakia

texts.en:
Zakia is 47 years old, a mother of eight children, aged between 6 and 27 years. Six of the children go to school. 

Zakia sells clothes and has been in a business for 9 years. After getting her loan, she would like to buy more clothes for resale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and to buy food for home consumption. In future, she wishes to be a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mwadjuma

texts.en: Mwadjuma is 39 years old, a mother of five children aged between 9 and 20 years. Her childrn all go to school. Mwadjuma owns a shop which includes telephones and their accessories, while her husband is a taxman. With the loan requested, she would like to buy more telephones with their accessories such as: sets and head sets for sale. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption and to increase her savings for a better future.

loans.use: to buy more telephones with their chargers, sets and head sets to sell.

loans.name: Husein

texts.en: Hussein is 45 years old, married with eight children aged between 7 and 20 years. His children all go to school. Hussein shows cinema and he has been in a business for 7 years, while his wife is working in restaurant. With the loan, he would like to buy more items such as chairs and televisions in order to expand his business. The profits from the business will be used to pay the school fees of his children. His goal is to earn at least 100,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more items such as chairs and televisions to sell, in order to expand his business.

loans.name: Samati

texts.en:
Samati is 29 years old, a mother of one child who is seven years old. Her child goes to school.

Samati owns a pharmacy and has been in a business for 2 years. With the loan requested, she would like to buy more drugs for resale. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption and to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more drugs for resale.

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en: Nadia is 25 years old, a mother of one child who is three years old, too young for school. Nadia sells clothes and has been in a business for 2 years. After getting her loan, she would like to buy more bed sheets to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make some savings to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more bed sheets to sell.

loans.name: Samiyati

texts.en: Samiyati is 35 years old, a mother of three children aged between 11 and 15 years. Her children all go to school. Samiyati owns a shop and has been in a business for 5 years. With the loan, she would like to buy saucepans and plates for resale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and to improve her welfare. In future, she aims to improve her savings.

loans.use: to buy saucepans and plates for resale.

loans.name: Fikiri

texts.en: Fikili, aged 36, is married with 2 children, aged 2 and 10 years, one of them goes to school. She sells clothes and has been in a business for 5 years while her husband has a butcher. With the loan, she would like to buy more shirts and t-shirts to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and to buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy more shirts and t-shirts to sell.

loans.name: Zakiya

texts.en: Zakia is 60 years old, married with 5 children aged between 3 and 35 years. Her children all go to school. Zakia owns a shop and has been in a business for 4 years. With the loan, she would like to buy lotions, soaps and Colgate to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and to buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy lotions, soaps and toothpaste to sell.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en: Jacqueline is 28 years old, not yet married. She owns a shop and has been in a business for 2 years. With the loan requested, she would like to buy more lotions and soaps to sell. The profits from the business will be used to enlarge her capital for a better future.

loans.use: to buy more lotions and soaps to sell.

loans.name: Eshonqul

texts.ru:
Эшонкул трудолюбивый мужчина 42 лет. Он родился и вырос в селе Навкент Шахристанского района. Он занимается деканством и животноводством. Он женат и отец троих детей. По профессии он механизатор. 
Эшонкул сотрудничает с МДО Арванд с 2013 года. Он разводит и продаёт скот. В этом деле ему помогает жена. Она ухаживает за скотом, а также продаёт полученное от скота молоко. Бизнес животноводства приносит Эшонкулу хороший и стабильный доход. Поэтому он желает расширить этот бизнес. Ему необходимо купить ещё несколько голов скота для выращивания и дальнейшей продажи. Для этого Эшонкул обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Он надеется, что этот бизнес будет успешно расширяться и приносить больше прибыли, чтобы качественно удовлетворять нужды семьи. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Eshonqul is a hardworking man of 42 years. He was born and grew up in the village Navkent in the Shahrituz region. He is a group farmer and raises livestock. He is married and is the father of three children. By profession, he is a mechanic.

Eshonqul has been partnering with MDO Arvand since 2013. He breeds and sells cattle. His wife helps him in this work. She cares for the cattle, and also sells the milk received from them. The cattle-raising business brings Eshonqul a good and stable income. Therefore, he wishes to expand this business. He needs to buy another few head of cattle to grow and sell in the future. For this, Eshonqul applied to Arvand and wants to receive a loan to purchase livestock. He hopes that this business will successfully expand and bring more profits, in order to qualitatively meet the needs of the family. He is grateful to Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнура, 27 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У Айнуры высшее образование, работает в суде. С 2012 года также занимается животноводством, мастер в своем деле. В хозяйстве Айнуры есть 15 овец. Ежемесячная прибыль Айнуры составляет до 25,000 сом(KGS). В целях увеличения поголовья скота, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 50,000 сом(KGS) на покупку скота для откорма. Доходы от кредита Айнура направит на дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Ainura is 27 years old, married, and the mother of two children. Ainura has a higher education and works in a court. Since 2012, she has also been raising livestock and she's a master in this field. On her homestead, Ainura has 15 sheep. Ainura's monthly income amounts to about 25,000 som (KGS). With the aim of increasing her livestock count, she applied to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase livestock for fattening.

With the income from the loan, Ainura will make further developments in her business.

loans.use: to buy livestock in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
Isidro tienen 74 años de edad es soltero vive en una comunidad de Sololá, el tiene una linda familia de 7 hijos de los cuales todos ya son mayores de edad y están  casados.
Isidro a pesar de su avanzada edad para él no es ningún impedimento él trabaja de la agricultura pues trabajar en el campo es su mayor pasión, el cultiva una diversidad de verduras pero según cuenta Isidro de que también tienen una su pequeña tienda en la casa donde vende todo tipo de abarrotes tales como azúcar, arroz, frijol y otras cosa más con estas dos actividades el genera sus ingresos y así poder  cubrir los gastos de la casa. Isidro un hombre amable y generoso, en este momento no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar la siembra de esta temporada es por ello que solicita un prestamo que lo utilizará para comprar sus semillas y fertilizantes. 
El sueño de Isidro es poder cultivar este año y sacar buenas cosechas para obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Isidro is 74 years old.  He is single and lives in the community of Solola.  He has a beautiful family of 7 children who are all adults and married.

In spite of his advanced age, for Isidro this is no impediment.  He works in agriculture; working in the field is his greatest passion.  He grows a variety of vegetables but Isidro also has a small store in his house where he sells all types of groceries such as sugar, rice, beans and other things.  With these two occupations he generates his income and thus is able to cover the household expenses.

Isidro is a kind and generous man.  At this time he does not have sufficient capital to do this season's planting and so he is asking for a loan that he will use to buy seeds and fertilizers.

Isidro's dream is to be able to farm this year and to have a good harvest in order to obtain better earnings.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Justine

texts.en: Justine is 26 years old and the mother of one child who is three years old and too young for school. She sells body lotions and jelly. With the loan requested, she would like to buy more lotions to sell. She plans to make savings and buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy more lotions to sell.

loans.name: Gul

texts.ru:
Гуль 60 летняя жительница района Рудаки. Она замужем. Ее муж предоставляет услуги по ремонту домов. Гуль с мужем вырастила пятерых детей, и за столь время было много невзгод и приятных моментов в их жизни. Гул с мужем пережили все благодаря друг другу и поддерживают друг друга во всем. 
  Гуль занимается продажей фруктов в одном из рынков района Рудаки. Она любит свою работу и ценит ее. Она не хочет сидеть дома и встречать старость без дела, Гуль хочет работать, приносить в дом доход и быть успешной женщиной. Гуль решила расширить деятельность и привести больше товара на продажу. Она планирует получить кредит и за счет кредита купить фрукты, увеличить ассортимент продаваемого товара и тем самым привлечь больше клиентов. Гуль верит, что ей не откажут в кредите, и она заранее благодарит Вас.
texts.en:
Gul is a 60-year-old resident of the Rudaki region. She is married. Her husband offers home repair services. Gul and her husband raised five children, and for quite a time there were a lot of challenging and pleasant moments in their lives. Gul and her husband survived all that thanks to each other and the support they gave one another throughout it all.

Gul sells fruits in one of the markets in the Rudaki region. She loves and values her work. She does not want to sit at home and to meet old age without work. Gul wants to work, to bring income into the home, and to be a successful woman. Gul decided to expand activities and to bring more goods for sale. She plans to receive a loan and with it to purchase fruits, to expand the assortment of goods for sale, and thereby to attract more customers. Gul believes that she will not be refused a loan and is grateful in advance.

loans.use: to acquire fruits and expand her activities.

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru: Сайёре 35 лет. У нее двое детей. Сыну 6 лет, дочке 10 лет. Сайера работает на не большой столовой. Она является поваром. 7 лет как Сайера каждый день рано ходит на работу в эту столовую, готовит и таким образом обеспечивает своих детей и мать. Сайёра обратилась за кредитом, чтобы отремонтировать столовую и создать себе условия работы. За счет заемных средств она приобретет стройматериалы, и оплатит услугу рабочих.
texts.en: Sayora is 35 years old. She has two children. Her son is six years old, and her daugher is ten. Sayora works in a small dining hall. She is the cook. For seven years, Sayora has been going to work early every day in this dining hall, cooking and in this manner supporting her children and mother. Sayora applied for a loan to renovate the dining hall and create herself better working conditions. By borrowing money, she will acquire the building materials and pay for the services of laborers.

loans.use: to renovate her dining hall.

loans.name: Virginie

texts.en: Virginie is 32 years, married with five children aged between 9 and 14 years. They all go to school. She owns a canteen while her husband has a studio and has been in business for two years. With the loan, she would like to buy baking powder in order to make more cakes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy baking powder in order to make more cakes to sell.
